Original: That request is from the woman in a
lab coat sitting over there... She is
the monster scholar Barbule.
[Page]
What an interesting occupation...
I would be curious to know more.
I shall await your swift return...
Translation: That request is from the woman in a
lab coat sitting over there... She is
the monster scholar Barbule.
[Page]
What an interesting occupation...
I would be curious to know more.
I shall await your swift return...

Original: Welcome back. I heard what happened.
It sounds as if you slayed what was
literally big game.
[Page]
The beast was called a [Enemy1:130]?
Is that some cruel joke?
[Page]
It seems there are still many strange
creatures in this world. I can see
where research would be necessary.
Translation: Welcome back. I heard what happened.
It sounds as if you slayed what was
literally big game.
[Page]
The beast was called a [Enemy1:130]?
Is that some cruel joke?
[Page]
It seems there are still many strange
creatures in this world. I can see
where research would be necessary.

Original: Upon reaching the frozen wall you
were asked to investigate, you see
many animals trapped within it.
[Page]
You approach the wall for closer
observation, when you sense a deadly
presence and a piercing chill!
[Page]
You know instantly that whatever is
the cause of this deathly chill is
the creator of this ice wall!
[Page]
You consider staying here and facing
it, though you know that the chill
will tax your stamina as you do so...
Translation: Upon reaching the frozen wall you
were asked to investigate, you see
many animals trapped within it.
[Page]
You approach the wall for closer
observation, when you sense a deadly
presence and a piercing chill!
[Page]
You know instantly that whatever is
the cause of this deathly chill is
the creator of this ice wall!
[Page]
You consider staying here and facing
it, though you know that the chill
will tax your stamina as you do so...

Original: [Color:5]Remain here?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Remain here?[Color:0]

Original: If you stay here any longer, you fear
that you may lose life and limb to
frostbite!
[Page]
Your decision made, you grip the
rudder with numb hands and quickly
steer the [Skyship] elsewhere.
Translation: If you stay here any longer, you fear
that you may lose life and limb to
frostbite!
[Page]
Your decision made, you grip the
rudder with numb hands and quickly
steer the [Skyship] elsewhere.

Original: You draw your coat against the cold
and do your best to endure the ominous
chill... Will the monster appear...?
Translation: You draw your coat against the cold
and do your best to endure the ominous
chill... Will the monster appear...?

Original: You continue waiting, but the monster
shows no sign of appearing. The frigid
winds continue to bite into you!
[Page]
[Color:3]The party loses 50 HP.[Color:0]
Translation: You continue waiting, but the monster
shows no sign of appearing. The frigid
winds continue to bite into you!
[Page]
[Color:3]The party loses 50 HP.[Color:0]

Original: But that hateful presence is still
palpable... There is no doubt that it
yet lurks nearby.
Translation: But that hateful presence is still
palpable... There is no doubt that it
yet lurks nearby.

Original: But you feel strangely certain that
the enemy has drawn nearer than
before... It may appear soon.
Translation: But you feel strangely certain that
the enemy has drawn nearer than
before... It may appear soon.

Original: You are free to remain and wait for
the monster to appear, or to heed the
danger and leave at once.
Translation: You are free to remain and wait for
the monster to appear, or to heed the
danger and leave at once.

Original: [Color:5]Remain here?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Remain here?[Color:0]

Original: No sooner do you elect to wait than
a tremendous roar echoes from beneath
the [Skyship]!
[Page]
When you look over the railing, you
see a shockingly immense ice monster
preparing to attack!
[Page]
A fight would be just the thing to
warm your frozen bodies, you think,
taking up arms to meet the monster!
Translation: No sooner do you elect to wait than
a tremendous roar echoes from beneath
the [Skyship]!
[Page]
When you look over the railing, you
see a shockingly immense ice monster
preparing to attack!
[Page]
A fight would be just the thing to
warm your frozen bodies, you think,
taking up arms to meet the monster!

Original: After a fierce battle, you defeat
the ice monster! It seems the animals
trapped in the wall were its prey...
[Page]
You take down notes on the monster on
a scroll and set off for Tharsis to
report to your scholarly client.
Translation: After a fierce battle, you defeat
the ice monster! It seems the animals
trapped in the wall were its prey...
[Page]
You take down notes on the monster on
a scroll and set off for Tharsis to
report to your scholarly client.

Original: Before you looms an ice wall, which
contains many animals preserved in the
same state as when they were alive...
Translation: Before you looms an ice wall, which
contains many animals preserved in the
same state as when they were alive...
